rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh gosh... The girl I dreamed up is
so insanely pretty...

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0002
tlk01000804_msg0003
rows.name:
What's that supposed to mean?
This is my homework! I'm studying!

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0101
rows.name:
My teacher said we could use anyone
we know personally as a reference...

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0102
rows.name:
But I don't have a mum or dad...
So I guess it'll have to be
Auntie Correl then.

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0201
rows.name: Having a Nopon teacher's really cute.

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0202
rows.name:
Kurukuru-san comes sometimes, but no
Nopon actually live here, so this is the
first chance I've had to get a good look.

rows.label: tlk01000804_msg0204
rows.name:
Huh...? Classes? O-of course I'm paying
attention to them!
